DOC.brief_title: Assessing Diagnostic Value Non-invasive FFRCT Coronary Care
DOC.detailed_description: REGISTRY OBJECTIVE The objective HeartFlow ADVANCE Registry evaluate utility , clinical outcome resource utilization FFRCT-guided evaluation clinically stable , symptomatic patient CAD order inform patient , health care provider , stakeholder technology effective efficient diagnosis management CAD . SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES : 1 . To determine availability FFRCT , addition coronary anatomy cCTA , lead significant change coronary management plan . 2 . To assess real world outcomes utilizing FFRCT guide invasive management and/or medical treatment . 3 . To assess resource utilization , follow standard practice diagnostic treatment pathway incorporate FFRCT preferred CAD diagnostic test . 4 . To provide society include patient , health care provider , stakeholder information diagnostic technology effective efficient manage patient CAD .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provide write informed consent 2 . Clinically stable , symptomatic patient undergo cCTA diagnose CAD meet eligibility criterion FFRCT . 1. cCTA show CAD 2 . Uninterpretable cCTA site assessment , severe artifact prevent angiographic evaluation 3 . Any active , serious , lifethreatening disease life expectancy le 1 year 4 . Inability comply followup requirement
